full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO PHYAG NA DO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DGA' ZHES BYA BA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG @011A *, ,BLO GROS PI LEG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN PO BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I, YI GE PA NI DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO BRIS SO, ,BRKA SHIS, ,
